markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Outrider](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=172)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 48 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

In your youth, you galloped on horseback over vast prairies, serving as a vanguard for your settlement, an army, or another group. Seeing so many different lands built a thirst in you to adventure and explore the world instead of just racing past it.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) skill, and the [Plains Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Express Rider](/Feats.aspx?ID=2126) skill feat.
name: Outrider

text: Outrider Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 48 2.0 In your youth, you galloped on horseback over vast prairies, serving as a vanguard for your settlement, an army, or another group. Seeing so many different lands built a thirst in you to adventure and explore the world instead of just racing past it. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Nature skill, and the Plains Lore skill. You gain the Express Rider skill feat.
